frontMatter.title: Competitor Analysis
frontMatter.metaDescription: Used to measure how competitive your product or service is against the competition.

checklist.question: Have you identified your competitors?
checklist.expectation: Define the industry that you are in and identify the direct and indirect competitors.

checklist.question: Have you done a SWOT analysis of your competitors?
checklist.expectation: Analyze the Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats of your competitors to understand the competition better.

checklist.question: Do you have a competitive analysis template to assess your competitors?
checklist.expectation: The competitive analysis template should assess all your competitors against the key competitive advantages, target market, market share, product and services, and marketing strategy.
